eu.amidst.dynamic.inference

Class DynamicVMP

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.dynamic.inference.DynamicVMP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithmForDBN

    public class DynamicVMP
extends Object
implements InferenceAlgorithmForDBN
    This class implements the interfaces InferenceAlgorithmForDBN. It handles and implements the Variational message passing (VMP) algorithm to perform inference on DynamicBayesianNetwork models. Winn, J.M., Bishop, C.M.: Variational message passing. Journal of Machine Learning Research 6 (2005) 661â€“694.
